title: Hybrid. Parts 1 and 2
description: This book is no longer available. Enmeshed in a universe that wants to use her, Chesara must find her way through political intrigue, lust, violence and ambition to find out who and what she is.Chesara’s Dakaran/human heritage and special abilities mean she is coddled and pampered as long as she does what she’s told, but she doesn’t have to be polite about it. Being kidnapped whilst on assignment shows her a different side to her gilded cage, and to her aide, Connor Temple. Can he keep her safe, or will the twinkling blue eyes of her captor convince her that a cage is still a cage when you’re considered an animal, no matter how safe it seems.
author: E. Jaye
